name: The cake is a lie.
description:
Even Droids need to borrow a cup of sugar from their fellow Droids.

Build enough housing, then every Droid can bake cakes and cookies without worrying if they have enough sugar.

The cake is a lie, there was no cake, and never will be any cake.  Sorry for any confusion.

name: More Subjects
description:
Your little tower is home to a few droids.  What if you built enough housing for 60 droids?

Simple equation to live by: more residents + high desirability = more income.

name: High Class Society
description:
You've built quite the tower now, but you still lack a major addition!

You lack high class (residents)!

name: Parking Authority
description: It has become a nightmare to park a car within walking distance to your Tower.  Unlock Parking Ramps & Spaces to make your residents happier!

name: Small Business
description: A small stimulus package will be awarded after creating jobs for 25 droids.

name: Master of Business Administration
description:
A stimulus package will be awarded after creating enough jobs for the droids living in your tower.

Use this money to further boost your economy.

name: Executive Suites
description:
The executive suites are decorated with marble floor to ceiling.  The desks are made of pure mahogany, with the finest of silk chairs.

You're in the big leagues now.

name: Build 8 Hotel Rooms.
description: Droids who are traveling on business trips will likely need somewhere to stay, a Hotel Room provides the perfect temporary housing option!

name: Add a Neighbor
description: By adding a neighbor, you will begin creating your own virtual neighborhood.  Each neighbor you add will unlock more opportunity for success.

name: Mass Transit
description: Good transportation is essential to the success of your Tower.  Make sure to build enough elevators and stairs, otherwise droids will not be able to get anywhere and will become dissatisfied.

name: 7th star is free!
description:
Dubai is home to the worlds only 7 star hotels, breaking existing rating systems.  But wait, this is not the real world!

Your tower is a world class one of a kind location, it should be properly rewarded with such a unique rating!

Upon completion, your maximum star rating will increase to 7.
